about.details:
Incorporated in 2016, Silicon Rentals Solutions Limited is an IT equipment outsourcing company, engaged in providing end-to-end IT equipment on a rental and returnable basis in India. The company provides laptops, desktops, printers, servers and other peripherals like CCTV cameras, projectors, storage devices, etc., mainly to small, medium and large corporate.

The company supports enterprises by providing them with the required IT products and equipment of major brands for a short period ranging from 1 day to a longer period up to 36 months based on the customer requirements.

The company provides IT renting services to the client base present in almost 16 states and 3 Union Territories across India. Silicon Rentals Solutions also has a trained and dedicated team of engineers who are capable of providing the support and maintenance of the hired equipment.

The company has a registered office located in Mumbai and Branch offices in Pune, New Delhi and Kolkata.

faqs.question: What is the Silicon Rental Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Silicon Rental Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 2712000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹21.15 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹78 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on September 28, 2022, and closes on September 30, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Silicon Rental Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Silicon Rental Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Silicon Rental Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Silicon Rental Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Silicon Rental Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Silicon Rental Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Silicon Rental Solutions IPO opens on September 28, 2022 and closes on September 30, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Silicon Rental Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Silicon Rental Solutions IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Silicon Rental Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Silicon Rental Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Silicon Rental Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Silicon Rental Solutions IPO will be done on Thursday, October 6, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, October 10, 2022. Check the Silicon Rental Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Silicon Rental Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Silicon Rental Solutions IPO listing date is on Monday, October 10, 2022.
